meanings.definition: The act of giving life or energy to something.
meanings.sent1: The vitalization of the garden with fresh water made the plants grow beautifully.
meanings.sent2: The vitalization of the party with music and dancing brought joy to everyone.
meanings.sent3: The vitalization of the sleepy cat with a laser pointer made for a hilarious chase.
meanings.sent4: The vitalization of the old building with colorful paint transformed it into a vibrant masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The vitalization of the dull room with bright decorations made it feel lively and welcoming.

meanings.definition: The process of making something more lively or active.
meanings.sent1: Regular exercise is a key factor in the vitalization of the body and mind.
meanings.sent2: The vitalization of the city streets with street performers created a bustling atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: The vitalization of the boring meeting with a surprise guest speaker caught everyone off guard.
meanings.sent4: The vitalization of the stagnant pond with a fountain brought new life to the area.
meanings.sent5: The vitalization of the plain website with interactive features made it more engaging for users.
